name: Thai-Style Sweet Chili Dipping Sauce
description: A classic sweet, spicy, and savory accompaniment for grilled meats.
recipeIngredient: 10 to 12 red Thai bird chilies, finely minced (see note)
1/2 cup palm or light brown sugar

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a small sealable container. Shake well, set aside, and allow sugar to dissolve, shaking every 10 minutes or so. When sugar is fully dissolved, store in refrigerator until ready to use. Sauce will keep in the refrigerator for up to 3 weeks.
